entry.title: Dummy entry
entry.description: Read what my equivalent of lorem ipsum has to say!

body.p: This is not a real post! This will be scrapped when I get blog posts working for real.
This lets me test a plethora of element styles:
I could go on and on!
As you've noticed, heading numero tres also works out.
There's some more headings I could try, like:
But I rarely use these. Maybe heading 4, if I fuck up my presentation a bit. For example:

blockquote.p: It should be regarded that this module is a revision of what once was a fuckup.
I sincerely apologize. I really do. I'm sorry.

body.p: I had to make a plethora of fonts to support the different heading styles and whatnot. Don't ask me how long it took.
